availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel W. Bloom (Cincinnati, OH, police officer)

body.p: Cincinnati, Ohio, police officer. Ohio native. Married to Elizabeth Bloom. Father of Andrew Bloom, William Bloom, and Charles Bloom. Police officer in Cincinnati in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hamilton County, Cincinnati Ward 5, p. 394.
Find A Grave, "Samuel W. Bloom (1815-1879)," Memorial #76081977, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/76081977 (accessed January 17, 2020).
